title: What can I do here?
excerpt: On the Pearson page, you can: Select your content, which may open in a separate
content:
On the Pearson page, you can:

Select your content, which may open in a separate window or tab.

If you haven't already, link your accounts.

Get access with any available options. Use a prepaid access code from your campus bookstore, credit card, or PayPal. Or use temporary access if you're waiting for financial aid.

Go to student help or Pearson Support. If available, download diagnostics to give support for troubleshooting issues.
